Articles.Content:
So I found a copy of 0.20.1 (With KSPX! The KSPX parts actually looked better than when they got implemented, I think. The yellow and black stripes on the rockomax quad adaptors, for instance.) on my computer, and I played it some. I decided to keep it instead of deleting it. I also have a copy of 0.21, 0.18, and maybe 0.19 on my other computer. Anyway, I wanted to name the updates, since ARM has a name.

0.24: Contracted

0.23.5: Asteroid Redirect Mission

0.23: Tweaked

0.22: Researched

0.21: Rebuiling

0.20: Claimed

0.19: Driven

0.18.3: The Demo v2

0.18: Electrical

0.17: Interplanetary

0.16: Extravehicular

0.15: Minimul Aeronautics

0.14: Persistant

0.13.3: The Demo

0.13: Fueled Up

0.12: Munacy

0.11: Controlled

0.10.1: Mac-made

0.10: Mapped

0.9: Staged

0.8: Stacked

0.7.3: Released

0.4: Grounded

0.3: Graphical

0.2: Spherical

0.1: Placeheld

0.0: Broken

Edited June 16, 2014 by GregroxMun
That's neat! According to your names I've been a member since Tweaked... So not that long lol
I've been around since Interplanetary, by your names. I still remember invoking the Kraken.
Does that mean the people who bought the game during .23 would be called a tweak-no that joke would probably not fly with the mods.
Interesting naming and it makes sense, been here since the "Released".

I've been here since just after The Demo.

Yeah, I've been here a long time.

I only remember, the first version I played did not have struts and the only thing that would attach radially were SRB's... what version was that?

Edit: I mean, struts where huge when they got added, there should be a strutted update

I only remember, the first version I played did not have struts and the only thing that would attach radially were SRB's... what version was that?

That would be the 0.8 version, Stacked, I guess.

EDIT: The 0.9 was when the struts arrived.

I only remember, the first version I played did not have struts and the only thing that would attach radially were SRB's... what version was that?

Edit: I mean, struts where huge when they got added, there should be a strutted update

0.8 added radial tanks.

Also, struts were added then as well.

I bought the game between the Persistent update and the Minimul Aeronautics updates then Man that was a while ago now... but I specifically remember the first update being the one with C7s space plane parts

Playing since "Controlled" I think.

Love the names, very creative.

0.24 - Contracted....Or not. Who knows?

As long as you don't go the Canonical route of using "adjective that starts with one letter + animal that starts with the same letter.", this should be fine.

One a second thought, those 10 minutes of cloudy feature development should not be wasted. Who knows what feature we will get or not get if the devs was time thinking of nifty names for their updates.
I've been here since Minimul Aeronautics...wow doesn't seem like its been that long.
